Creamy Heart Soup.description: Enjoying this sweet soup with another person will bring you both closer together.
Creamy Heart Soup.name: Creamy Heart Soup

Pumpkin Stew.description: Simply simmer a fortified pumpkin to make this dish. A favorite in Kakariko Village.
Pumpkin Stew.name: Pumpkin Stew

Veggie Cream Soup.description: This creamy soup showcases the sweetness of vegetables in a veritable taste explosion.
Veggie Cream Soup.name: Veggie Cream Soup

Cream of Mushroom Soup.description: The creamy mushroom and vegetable soup is so chunky it eats like a meal!
Cream of Mushroom Soup.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
Cream of Mushroom Soup.ingredient2: Any other vegetable, herb, or flower

Cream of Vegetable Soup.description: Made by simmering vegetables in milk, this healthy dish is as simple as the ingredients
Cream of Vegetable Soup.name: Cream of Vegetable Soup

Carrot Stew.description: This simple stew sat simmering for a long time to bring out the sweetness of the carrots.
Carrot Stew.name: Carrot Stew

Vegetable Risotto.description: The sweetness of the ingredients gives this risotto a mild flavor.
Vegetable Risotto.name: Vegetable Risotto

Mushroom Risotto.description: The tantalizing aroma of mushrooms and butter beckons you to the table.
Mushroom Risotto.name: Mushroom Risotto

Curry Pilaf.description: The goron spice used in this pilaf has given it a rich, spicy aroma.
Curry Pilaf.name: Curry Pilaf

Mushroom Rice Balls.description: The aroma of the mushrooms tickles your nose as you peel back the leafy wrapping.
Mushroom Rice Balls.name: Mushroom Rice Balls

Veggie Rice Balls.description: This home-style dish of Kakariko Village is stuffed with the bounty of the mountains.
Veggie Rice Balls.name: Veggie Rice Balls

Curry Rice.description: A favorite all over Hyrule, this simple dish has a flavor you just won't get tired of.
Curry Rice.name: Curry Rice

Fried Egg and Rice.description: The soft egg yolk pairs well with the fresh rice in this simple dish.
Fried Egg and Rice.name: Fried Egg and Rice

Mushroom Omelet.description: The fluffy texture of this omelet is one of the great joys of this dish, as well as life.
Mushroom Omelet.name: Mushroom Omelet

Vegetable Omelet.description: This home-style dish mixes fluffy eggs with chopped vegetables for nutritional balance.
Vegetable Omelet.name: Vegetable Omelet

Vegetable Curry.description: This healthy curry is popular for its mild flavor and moderate spiciness.
Vegetable Curry.name: Vegetable Curry

Fragrant Mushroom Sauté.description: The fragrant aroma of this sautéed spice and mushroom dish makes your mouth water.
Fragrant Mushroom Sauté.name: Fragrant Mushroom Sauté

Herb Sauté.description: A fragrant mixture of herbs and spices. It's easily recognized by its unique aroma.
Herb Sauté.name: Herb Sauté

Salt-Grilled Greens.description: A health-boosting dish made with leafy greens and a touch of salt.
Salt-Grilled Greens.name: Salt-Grilled Greens

Salt-Grilled Mushrooms.description: A basic mushroom dish made by lightly salting mushrooms and grilling them.
Salt-Grilled Mushrooms.name: Salt-Grilled Mushrooms

Steamed Mushrooms.description: A healthy vegetable dish achieved by steaming mushrooms in plant leaves.
Steamed Mushrooms.name: Steamed Mushrooms

Mushroom Skewer.description: This simple mushroom-packed skewer has its colorful presentation to thank for its appeal
Mushroom Skewer.name: Mushroom Skewer

Copious Mushroom Skewers.description: Fans of fungal cuisine can't resist this simple mushroom-skewer dish. Very filling.
Copious Mushroom Skewers.name: Copious Mushroom Skewers

Fried Wild Greens.description: A basic vegetable dish made by sautéing fresh wild plants.
Fried Wild Greens.name: Fried Wild Greens
Fried Wild Greens.ingredient1: Any vegetable, flower, or herb combination

Copious Fried Wild Greens.description: A healthy dish made by cooking mixed greens over a strong flame.
Copious Fried Wild Greens.name: Copious Fried Wild Greens
Copious Fried Wild Greens.ingredient1: Any four different herbs, vegetables, or flowers

Omelet.description: This simple dish is common all over Hyrule. Simply fry egg until it's nice and plump.
Omelet.name: Omelet

Clam Chowder.description: The nutritional value of hearty blueshell snail combines with butter and milk in a rich soup.
Clam Chowder.name: Clam Chowder

Creamy Seafood Soup.description: Thick-cut chunks of seafood and stock provides a satisfying savoriness.
Creamy Seafood Soup.name: Creamy Seafood Soup

Seafood Curry.description: This dish brims with treasures from the sea. Its spice packs a kick, so it's not for kids.
Seafood Curry.name: Seafood Curry
Seafood Curry.ingredient1: Hearty Blueshell Snail or any Porgy

Salmon Risotto.description: The rice used in this rich risotto permeates the light flavor of the salmon.
Salmon Risotto.name: Salmon Risotto

Crab Risotto.description: An everyday stable of seaside villages, the secret to its delicious flavor lies in crab fat.
Crab Risotto.name: Crab Risotto

Seafood Fried Rice.description: Various seafood has been sautéed with rice. The stronger the flame, the tastier the dish!
Seafood Fried Rice.name: Seafood Fried Rice
Seafood Fried Rice.ingredient1: Hearty Blueshell Snail or any Porgy

Seafood Paella.description: No fisherman's birthday bash would be complete without this top-shelf seafood dish.
Seafood Paella.name: Seafood Paella

Crab Omelet with Rice.description: The fluffy crab legs pair perfectly with the rice for a truly scrumptious dish.
Crab Omelet with Rice.name: Crab Omelet with Rice

Seafood Rice Balls.description: Stuffed with aromatic seafood, the flavor can vary by ingredients but never disappoints.
Seafood Rice Balls.name: Seafood Rice Balls

Fish Pie.description: A mainstay in any fisherman's home, the crisp crust pairs well with the fishy flavor.
Fish Pie.name: Fish Pie

Salmon Meunière.description: The crispy skin of this fried hearty salmon puts its texture in a class all its own.
Salmon Meunière.name: Salmon Meunière

Porgy Meunière.description: Popular among residents of coastal regions, this juicy porgy is a delish dish.
Porgy Meunière.name: Porgy Meunière

Seafood Meunière.description: Rich butter flanks fresh seafood. The secret ingredient is lots and lots of love.
Seafood Meunière.name: Seafood Meunière
Seafood Meunière.ingredient1: Any seafood excluding Hearty Salmon or Porgy

Glazed Seafood.description: A seafood dish that you can actually wolf down whole!
Glazed Seafood.name: Glazed Seafood

Crab Stir-Fry.description: The Goron spice used in preparing this crab pairs perfectly with the flavor of the meat.
Crab Stir-Fry.name: Crab Stir-Fry

Salt-Grilled Crab.description: Nine out of ten fishermen agree: crab is best enjoyed grilled and with just a bit of salt.
Salt-Grilled Crab.name: Salt-Grilled Crab

Salt-Grilled Fish.description: A simple dish made by rolling a whole fish in natural rock salt before grilling it.
Salt-Grilled Fish.name: Salt-Grilled Fish

Copious Fish Skewers.description: It's just a whole heap of stuff shoved on to a skewer, but it's still a pretty tasty dish.
Copious Fish Skewers.name: Copious Fish Skewers

Spicy Peppered Seafood.description: The pepper seeds grilled with this seafood draw out its taste and pleasant aroma.
Spicy Peppered Seafood.name: Spicy Peppered Seafood

Steamed Fish.description: A refined dish made by wrapping a fresh fish in fragrant wild greens and cooking it.
Steamed Fish.name: Steamed Fish

Fish and Mushroom Skewer.description: A simple dish made by cooking skewered, fresh fish alongside fragrant mushrooms.
Fish and Mushroom Skewer.name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer

Seafood Skewer.description: The natural water in this medley of seafaring creatures makes for a delicious broth.
Seafood Skewer.name: Seafood Skewer

Fish Skewer.description: A simple dish made by cooking chunks of fresh fish on a skewer.
Fish Skewer.name: Fish Skewer

Gourmet Meat Stew.description: The meat has simmered for so long it melts in your mouth. A true bucket-list meal!
Gourmet Meat Stew.name: Gourmet Meat Stew
Gourmet Meat Stew.ingredient1: Raw Gourmet Meat or Raw Whole Bird

Prime Meat Stew.description: Letting the large portions of choice cuts of meat simmer brought out their savoriness.
Prime Meat Stew.name: Prime Meat Stew
Prime Meat Stew.ingredient1: Raw Prime Meat or Raw Bird Thigh

Meat Stew.description: The hearty meat in this mainstay dish leaves bellies satisfied all throughout Hyrule.
Meat Stew.name: Meat Stew
Meat Stew.ingredient1: Raw Meat or Raw Bird Drumstick

Creamy Meat Soup.description: This nutritious soup contains serious portions of lightly-braised meat and many vegetables.
Creamy Meat Soup.name: Creamy Meat Soup

Meat Curry.description: The heat from the spice allows you to enjoy the large portion of the meat's savoriness.
Meat Curry.name: Meat Curry

Prime Meat Curry.description: The high-quality meat in this curry has given it a deeper taste than most other curries.
Prime Meat Curry.name: Prime Meat Curry

Gourmet Meat Curry.description: The high-quality meat used in this prized dish satisfies meat and curry lovers alike.
Gourmet Meat Curry.name: Gourmet Meat Curry

Poultry Curry.description: The savory meat pairs well with the aroma of spice in this common curry.
Poultry Curry.name: Poultry Curry

Prime Poultry Curry.description: The secret to this curry's flavor is taking it off the heat while you add the spices.
Prime Poultry Curry.name: Prime Poultry Curry

Gourmet Poultry Curry.description: Once served in Hyrule Castle, the poultry used in this dish is of immensely high quality.
Gourmet Poultry Curry.name: Gourmet Poultry Curry

Meaty Rice Balls.description: The sweet and spicy meat stuffed into these rice balls will keep you full for some time.
Meaty Rice Balls.name: Meaty Rice Balls

Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin.description: This hollow, meat-filled fortified pumpkin is a local specialty of Kakariko Village.
Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin.name: Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin

Meat Pie.description: You'll need an extra napkin to deal with this juicy pie of perfectly baked minced meat.
Meat Pie.name: Meat Pie

Poultry Pilaf.description: Sautéed Hylian rice steamed in poultry broth. Cook on low heat until the rice is fluffy.
Poultry Pilaf.name: Poultry Pilaf

Prime Poultry Pilaf.description: The rice permeates the savory taste of the poultry in this Gerudo-region favorite.
Prime Poultry Pilaf.name: Prime Poultry Pilaf

Gourmet Poultry Pilaf.description: Made with the highest-quality poultry, every bite of this pilaf floods your mouth with flavor.
Gourmet Poultry Pilaf.name: Gourmet Poultry Pilaf

Meat and Rice Bowl.description: This dish of rice and lightly seared meat is a mainstay all throughout Hyrule.
Meat and Rice Bowl.name: Meat and Rice Bowl
Meat and Rice Bowl.ingredient1: Raw Meat or Raw Bird Drumstick

Prime Meat and Rice Bowl.description: This bowl is loaded with high-quality meat. Your hunt for a serious meal ends here.
Prime Meat and Rice Bowl.name: Prime Meat and Rice Bowl
Prime Meat and Rice Bowl.ingredient1: Raw Prime Meat or Raw Bird Thigh

Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl.description: Only the most carefully selected cuts of high-quality meats go into this dish.
Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl.name: Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl
Gourmet Meat and Rice Bowl.ingredient1: Raw Gourmet Meat or Raw Whole Bird

Glazed Meat.description: The sweetness of the honey permeates the meat, giving it a complex taste profile.
Glazed Meat.name: Glazed Meat

Spiced Meat Skewer.description: A special Goron spice covers up the scent of the meat, allowing its flavor to shine.
Spiced Meat Skewer.name: Spiced Meat Skewer

Prime Spiced Meat Skewer.description: The simple preparation of this steak dish belies its complex taste profile.
Prime Spiced Meat Skewer.name: Prime Spiced Meat Skewer

Gourmet Spiced Meat Skewer.description: The rich aroma and juicy texture of this high-quality meat puts it in a league of its own.
Gourmet Spiced Meat Skewer.name: Gourmet Spiced Meat Skewer

Salt-Grilled Meat.description: Short on ingredients? Just rub some meat in salt and cook it for a simple, tasty dish.
Salt-Grilled Meat.name: Salt-Grilled Meat
Salt-Grilled Meat.ingredient1: Raw Meat or Raw Bird Drumstick

Salt-Grilled Prime Meat.description: A simple yet exquisite dish made by grilling high-quality meat on top of rock salt.
Salt-Grilled Prime Meat.name: Salt-Grilled Prime Meat
Salt-Grilled Prime Meat.ingredient1: Raw Prime Meat or Raw Bird Thigh

Salt-Grilled Gourmet Meat.description: This lavish grilled dish makes liberal use of high-quality cuts of meat.
Salt-Grilled Gourmet Meat.name: Salt-Grilled Gourmet Meat
Salt-Grilled Gourmet Meat.ingredient1: Raw Gourmet Meat or Raw Whole Bird

Copious Meat Skewers.description: Just shove a bunch of meat on to a skewer and you're good to go.
Copious Meat Skewers.name: Copious Meat Skewers

Pepper Steak.description: A dish made by cooking meat in crushed peppers, suppressing the gamy taste while accentuating its flavor.
Pepper Steak.name: Pepper Steak

Steamed Meat.description: This meat dish has been wrapped in fragrant leaves and steamed to preserve its moisture.
Steamed Meat.name: Steamed Meat

Meat and Mushroom Skewer.description: A filling dish made by grilling various mountain ingredients with either steak or bird meat.
Meat and Mushroom Skewer.name: Meat and Mushroom Skewer

Meat Skewer.description: A juicy, filling snack made by grilling small chunks of meat on a skewer.
Meat Skewer.name: Meat Skewer

Meat and Seafood Fry.description: A filling dish made by cooking fresh seafood and meat together.
Meat and Seafood Fry.name: Meat and Seafood Fry
Meat and Seafood Fry.ingredient1: Raw Meat or Raw Bird Drumstick

Prime Meat and Seafood Fry.description: This comfort dish is made with choice cuts of meat and seafood.
Prime Meat and Seafood Fry.name: Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
Prime Meat and Seafood Fry.ingredient1: Raw Bird Thigh or Raw Prime Meat

Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry.description: A marriage of the choicest cuts of meat and seafood. As delicious as it is filling!
Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry.name: Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry
Gourmet Meat and Seafood Fry.ingredient1: Raw Gourmet Meat or Raw Whole Bird

Apple Pie.description: The crispy, flaky pie crust and sweet apples are a match made in heaven.
Apple Pie.name: Apple Pie

Pumpkin Pie.description: The intense sweetness of fortified pumpkins makes this dessert popular among children.
Pumpkin Pie.name: Pumpkin Pie

Fruit Pie.description: A celebration isn't a celebration until this fruit-filled crust hits the table!
Fruit Pie.name: Fruit Pie
Fruit Pie.ingredient1: Any fruit excluding apple or pumpkin

Fruitcake.description: Making ample use of fruits found all over Hyrule, this cake is a must for celebrations.
Fruitcake.name: Fruitcake

Carrot Cake.description: Even those who don't like carrots tend to enjoy the mild sweetness of this cake.
Carrot Cake.name: Carrot Cake

Nutcake.description: Forest nuts give this cake a pleasant texture and a simple, understated sweetness.
Nutcake.name: Nutcake

Plain Crepe.description: The simplicity of this dish lets the flavor of its ingredients shine.
Plain Crepe.name: Plain Crepe

Honey Crepe.description: Honey has been drizzled over thin crepes to bring out their nautral sweetness and flavor.
Honey Crepe.name: Honey Crepe

Wildberry Crepe.description: Sweet, tart wildberries are folded into thin, springy dough to make this dessert.
Wildberry Crepe.name: Wildberry Crepe

Egg Tart.description: You'll know this simple dessert is done baking when it smells just delightful.
Egg Tart.name: Egg Tart

Egg Pudding.description: Made by cooking eggs and milk in a special mold, its soft texture melts in your mouth.
Egg Pudding.name: Egg Pudding

Fried Bananas.description: Children love fried mighty bananas. The trick is frying them over very high heat.
Fried Bananas.name: Fried Bananas

Hot Buttered Apple.description: The apple's sweetness has been enhanced by smothering it with butter and baking it.
Hot Buttered Apple.name: Hot Buttered Apple

Honeyed Apple.description: A juicy sweet-and-sour dish combining newly ripened apples with honey.
Honeyed Apple.name: Honeyed Apple

Honeyed Fruits.description: A dish that combines the thick sweetness of honey with the acidity of sour fruits.
Honeyed Fruits.name: Honeyed Fruits

Honey Candy.description: A natural sweet, brimming with nutrition and made by stewing fresh honey.
Honey Candy.name: Honey Candy

Monster Soup.description: Using monster extract as a base, this soup's distinct gaminess is either loved or hated.
Monster Soup.name: Monster Soup

Monster Curry.description: This unusual take on curry uses monster extract and doesn't rely on spices.
Monster Curry.name: Monster Curry

Monster Rice Balls.description: Rice balls flavored with monster extract. Their unique aroma is not for everyone.
Monster Rice Balls.name: Monster Rice Balls

Monster Stew.description: Meat and seafood simmered in monster extract. A savory dish despite its ingredients.
Monster Stew.name: Monster Stew

Monster Cake.description: It's said that once you have a taste of this cake, you'll never forget its sweetness.
Monster Cake.name: Monster Cake

Dubious Food.description: It's too gross to even look at. A bizarre smell issues forth from this heap. Eating it won't hurt you though...probably.
Dubious Food.name: Dubious Food
Dubious Food.ingredient1: Two or more items with effect

Rock-Hard Food.description: A dish gone awry after adding the wrong ingredient. Chewing your way through this won't be fun, but it will fill you up when you're between a rock and a hard place.
Rock-Hard Food.name: Rock-Hard Food

Spicy Sautéed Peppers.description: The spiciness of these sautéed peppers has been broken by the heat for a sweeter taste.
Spicy Sautéed Peppers.name: Spicy Sautéed Peppers

Fairy Tonic.description: This powerful recovery elixir harnesses the power of fairies. It has a sweet fragrance.
Fairy Tonic.name: Fairy Tonic
Fairy Tonic.ingredient2: Any gem, animal, or monster part

Sautéed Nuts.description: These sautéed tree seeds are the perfect snack for the busy adventurer on the go!
Sautéed Nuts.name: Sautéed Nuts

Simmered Fruit.description: This sweet dish is made by heaping tasty fruits into a pan and simmering until tender.
Simmered Fruit.name: Simmered Fruit

Milk.description: Make this by heating up some milk. Drink it before bed to ensure a good night's sleep.
Milk.name: Milk

Wheat Bread.description: Made with wheat from the Tabantha region, this soft, springy bread smells just heavenly.
Wheat Bread.name: Wheat Bread

Steamed Fruit.description: A regional dish made by steaming near-ripened fruits in the leaves of fragrant plants.
Steamed Fruit.name: Steamed Fruit

Fruit and Mushroom Mix.description: This dish contrasts the sweetness of fruit with the savoriness of mushrooms.
Fruit and Mushroom Mix.name: Fruit and Mushroom Mix

Copious Simmered Fruit.description: The flavors of the various fruits in this simmered dish exist in perfect harmony.
Copious Simmered Fruit.name: Copious Simmered Fruit

Glazed Mushrooms.description: The honey in this mushroom dish gives it a sweet, complex taste and a savory finish.
Glazed Mushrooms.name: Glazed Mushrooms

Glazed Veggies.description: Don't like the taste of vegetables? Simply sauté them in honey for a salty-sweet flavor!
Glazed Veggies.name: Glazed Veggies
